casebody.data:
APPEALS ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW

2003-0729. Sekula v. Hartford Ins. Co.

Cuyahoga App. No. 81295, 2003-0hio-1160. Discretionary appeal allowed and cause held for the decision in 2002-0932, Westfield Ins. Co. v. Galatis, Summit App. No. 20784, 2002-0hio-1502, and 2002- 0579, Burkhart v. CNA Ins. Co., Stark App. No. 2001CA00265, 2002-0hio-903; briefing schedule stayed.

Resnick, F.E. Sweeney and Pfeifer, JJ., dissent.
